entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as a team that is cheering and feeling heartened. The text states 'Gryffindor cheers and felt heartened' indicating their positive emotions.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a student who is participating in the Quidditch match. The text states 'Harry ducked a Bludger that Crabbe had sent rocketing in his direction' indicating his actions during the game.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as a student who is participating in the Quidditch match. The text states 'Crabbe had sent rocketing in his direction' indicating his actions during the game.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as a student who is participating in the Quidditch match. The text states 'but Malfoy, like him, was continuing to soar around the stadium' indicating his actions during the game.

entities.name: pucey
entities.description: Pucey is mentioned as a student who is participating in the Quidditch match. The text states '— Pucey throws to Warrington, Warrington to Montague' indicating his actions during the game.

entities.name: johnson
entities.description: Johnson is mentioned as a student who is participating in the Quidditch match. The text states '— Johnson intervenes, Johnson takes the Quaffle' indicating his actions during the game.

entities.name: bell
entities.description: Bell is mentioned as a student who is participating in the Quidditch match. The text states '— Bell’s hit by a Bludger from Goyle of Slytherin' indicating his actions during the game.

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Weasley is mentioned as a student who is participating in the Quidditch match. The text states 'WEASLEY WAS BORN IN A BIN, HE ALWAYS LETS THE QUAFFLE IN' indicating his characteristics.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is mentioned as a team that is participating in the Quidditch match. The text states '— Bell’s hit by a Bludger from Goyle of Slytherin' indicating their involvement in the game.

relationships.description: Gryffindor is cheering for Harry, indicating their support for him during the game.
Crabbe and Harry are opponents in the Quidditch match, indicated by Crabbe sending a Bludger towards Harry.
Malfoy and Harry are rivals in the Quidditch match, indicated by their actions during the game.
Pucey and Warrington are teammates in the Quidditch match, indicated by their actions during the game.
Johnson is possessing the Quaffle during the game, indicated by his actions.
Bell is hit by a Bludger from Goyle of Slytherin, indicating that he is a victim in the game.
